entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening then changing to rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain or snow. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
